footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All Rights Reserved.
heroSubtitle1: A space for deep healing, care, and transformation with ancestral medicines.
heroSubtitle2: Discover the path to your inner self and reconnect with your essence.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Join us to live a unique experience of connection and healing.
pastCeremoniesSubtitle: Relive the magic of our past encounters. Each video is a window to the transformation and connection we have shared.
preparationCtaDescription: The journey begins long before the ceremony. Discover how to prepare your body, mind, and spirit to receive the medicine in the best way.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social networks and be part of our healing community. Find out about our upcoming events, share your experiences, and connect with other seekers on the same path.
addVideoDescription: Add a new video to the past ceremonies carousel.
videoFormUrlOrUpload: You must provide a URL or upload a file.
deleteVideoConfirmDescription: This action is irreversible. The video will be permanently deleted.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Modify the details of the selected ceremony.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The ceremony will be permanently removed.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
registerSubtext: Join our community and start your healing journey.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully logged in with Google.
registerSuccessDescription: We have sent a verification link to your email.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral psychoactive infusion from the Amazon, made from the combination of the Banisteriopsis caapi vine and the Psychotria viridis shrub. It is considered a sacred medicine that facilitates deep introspection, emotional healing, and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew induces altered states of consciousness, allowing access to profound subconscious and spiritual content. This process can lead to the release of emotional blockages, a deeper understanding of oneself, and a renewed sense of purpose and connection with life.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a master plant, a guide that teaches and shows the path to self-knowledge. Each experience is unique and is deeply influenced by the intention and preparation of the participant.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: It helps to release traumas and emotional patterns, providing a clearer perspective on life.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Many report improvements in physical ailments and a deep sense of spiritual renewal.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It expands consciousness, fostering a feeling of unity with nature and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: A shared experience where collective energy enhances individual healing in a contained and respectful environment.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, focused on your specific process with the guide's full attention.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the souls dedicated to accompanying you on your healing journey. Each of our guides brings their unique experience, wisdom, and compassion to create a safe and transformative space.
editGuideDescription: Update the information for this guide.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The guide's profile will be permanently removed.
preparationProcessDescription: Weeks before, you begin a diet and mental preparation.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A night of introspection guided by songs and silence.
experienceProcessDescription: A deep journey into your being, guided by the medicine.
integrationProcessDescription: We support you in incorporating the teachings into your daily life.
dietSubtitle: A fundamental step to prepare your body and spirit. It is recommended to follow it for at least one week before the ceremony.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your intention is the compass that will guide your journey. Dedicate time to reflection and connection.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and open the heart.
intentionsDescription: What do you seek to heal or understand? Clearly define your purpose for the ceremony.
reflectionDescription: Write about your emotions, fears, and hopes before the experience.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring up deep emotions. The key is to trust, surrender, and allow the medicine to work. Remember that you will be in a safe and supportive space to navigate whatever arises. Approach the experience with an open heart and a willingness to face your own shadow to find the light.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare your backpack with essential items for your comfort and well-being during the night.
essentialsList: Change of clothes for the next day.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Change the application's colors (uses HSL format).
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users in the application.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! We invite you to complete your profile at The Art of Healing to prepare for your ceremony. Please register if you haven't already, and then fill out the health questionnaire here: https://elartedesanarcr.com/questionnaire
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review conversations between users and the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to see the details.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been started yet.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to save your progress, book ceremonies, and receive personalized guidance.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see memories from past ceremonies.
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: These are our upcoming ceremonies. Click to see details and book.
tourStepFinal: Now, let's go to an important step: the health questionnaire. Your sincerity is crucial for your safety.
tourWelcomeDescription: We are happy to have you. Before we start a quick tour, could you provide us with your phone number? This will help us stay in touch about your ceremonies.
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We will only use it for important communications about your ceremony.
tourPhoneNumberError: Could not save the phone number.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer with complete honesty. This information is confidential and will be used by our guides to provide you with the best possible care.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions? (e.g., heart problems, high blood pressure, epilepsy)
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication, including antidepressants, anxiolytics, or supplements?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications and supplements you are taking
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions? (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please specify your mental health history
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with ayahuasca or other psychoactive substances?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or achieve with this experience...
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Thank you for completing your information. We are one step closer to your journey.
questionnaireErrorDescription: We couldn't save your answers. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
errorRequiredDetails: Details are required if you answered 'Yes'.
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not submitted the questionnaire yet.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your spiritual guide. I am here to answer your questions about Ayahuasca, our ceremonies, and your path of inner growth. How can I help you today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
